tha-ap402:10.4: Āgacchuṁ buddhasantikaṁ → upagacchuṁ tadā jinaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); āgañchuṁ buddhasantike (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap402:23.2: aṭṭhadīpaphalena … jayissantimaṁ jantū → aṭṭhadīpaphalena ca. upaṭṭhissantimaṁ jantuṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed), aṭṭhadīpaphalena hi. na jahissantimaṁ jantuṁ (pts1ed), aṭṭha dīpā phalena hi. na jahissanti maṁ jantuṁ (?)
